translations: v．装饰，悬挂（尤指花环、彩带等）：用花环、彩带等装饰或悬挂在墙壁、天花板等地方。

sentences.sentence: Carefully watch these trees at the Spring Festival of the willow, the branches long, but festooning shallow, dots of green.
sentences.translation: 仔细欣赏这几棵迎春的柳树，长长的枝条上，只是缀着浅浅的，星星点点的绿。

sentences.sentence: Next we have the interior decorations, the festooning of which takes place around Halloween at some Manhattan department stores.
sentences.translation: 但是大多数商店还是选择在十月中旬。其次，万圣节前夕，曼哈顿的一些商场开始布置室内装饰和花彩装饰。

sentences.sentence: In the late 1800s in Trieste, Italy, a medical student named Sigmund Freud was assigned to investigate the testes of the male eel, postulated to be loops of white matter festooning the body cavity.
sentences.translation: 1800年代末，在意大利的里雅斯特，一位名叫西格蒙德·弗洛伊德的医科学生受命研究雄性鳗鱼的睾丸。他假设鳗鱼睾丸是体腔内结成的白质环。
